channel.title: Music – Bobby McFerrin
channel.description: Recent content in Bobby McFerrin on Music

item.title: Bobby McFerrin - Don't Worry Be Happy
item.description:
작곡: Bobby McFerrin / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 8398 / KY: 7903

Here’s a little song
I wrote
You might want to sing
it note for note
Don’t worry be happy
in every life
We have some trouble
but when you worry
You make it double
don’t worry be happy
Don’t worry be happy
now woo-
Don’t worry woo-
be happy woo-
Don’t worry be happy
woo- don’t worry woo-
Be happy woo-
don’t worry be happy
Ain’t got no place
to lay your head
Somebody came and
took your bed
Don’t worry be happy
the landlord say
Your rent is late
he may
Have to litigate
don’t worry be happy
Look at me
I’m happy woo-
Don’t worry woo-
be happy woo- woo-
Don’t worry woo-
be happy woo-
Ain’t got no cash
ain’t got no style
Ain’t got no gal
to make you smile
Don’t worry be happy
‘cause when you worry
Your face will frown
and that will bring
Everybody down
don’t worry be happy
Don’t worry be happy
now woo-
Don’t worry woo-
be happy woo-
Don’t worry be happy
woo- don’t worry woo-
Be happy
don’t worry be happy
Woo- don’t worry woo-
be happy woo-
